Function reference

Read

Fetch data, spatial and non-spatial, especially from APIs

get_species_by_feature()
Get species by feature

Analyze

Analyses

Visualize

Plot and map Seascapes

ms_basemap()
Basemap

Data

Lookups for easy reference

ply_rgns
Polygons of Regions
ply_shlfs
Polygons of Shelf Regions

Other

Other functions not defined by the concepts above

hello()
Hello, World!
ply_rgns_s05
Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5\ A spatial features sf data frame with 27 rows and 8 columns:
shlf_key

key for shelf polygon containing region

shlf_name

name for shelf polygon containing region

rgn_key

key for region polygon

rgn_name

name for region polygon

ctr_lon

centroid longitude

ctr_lat

centroid longitude

area_km2

area in square kilometers

geometry

geometry of polygon as sf::st_geometry()

BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas and MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act ply_rgns_s05 Intersection of polygons describing the BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas) clipped to the federal U.S. waters between the 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone and 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act). Simplified to 5\ data datasets
ply_shlfs_s05
Polygons of Shelf Regions, simplified to 5\ A spatial features sf data frame with 5 rows and 6 columns:
shlf_key

key for shelf polygon containing region

shlf_name

name for shelf polygon containing region

ctr_lon

centroid longitude

ctr_lat

centroid longitude

area_km2

area in square kilometers

geometry

geometry of polygon as sf::st_geometry()

BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas and MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act ply_shlfs_s05 Intersection of polygons describing the BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil and Gas Planning Areas) clipped to the federal U.S. waters between the 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone and 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act). Summarized to Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) region name (key): Alaska (AK), Atlantic (ATL), Gulf of Mexico (GOM), Hawaii (HI), Pacific (PAC). Simplified to 5\ data datasets
